short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-driven tool platform and community for web-based work.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Frago - Transform Your Browsing into an AI-Powered Journey | 让AI改变你的网络冲浪体验

Tired of information overload? Struggling with content management? Meet Frago - your personal AI-powered web assistant that revolutionizes how you browse, learn, and organize online content.

厌倦了信息过载？为内容管理而烦恼？遇见 Frago - 您的私人AI网络助手，彻底改变您的网络浲浪、学习和内容管理方式。

 ✨ Why Frago? | 为什么选择 Frago？

- Instant Knowledge Extraction - Turn any webpage into digestible insights in seconds
- AI-Powered Understanding - Get intelligent summaries and analysis of any content
- Smart Organization - Build your personal knowledge base effortlessly
- **Privacy First** - Your data stays with you, always

- 即时知识提取 - 秒级将任何网页转化为易消化的精华
- AI驱动理解- 获取内容的智能摘要和分析
- 智能组织 - 轻松构建个人知识库
- 隐私优先 - 您的数据始终由您掌控

🎯 Perfect For | 完美适用于

- 📚 Researchers & Students
- 💼 Professionals & Knowledge Workers
- ✍️ Writers & Content Creators
- 🌏 Global Communication Needs
- 🔍 Digital Information Explorers

- 📚 研究人员和学生
- 💼 专业人士和知识工作者
- ✍️ 作家和内容创作者
- 🌏 全球交流需求者
- 🔍 数字信息探索者

 🌟 Key Features | 核心功能

 🧠 AI-Powered Intelligence | AI驱动智能
- Multi-model AI chat support (OpenRouter, OpenAI, Claude, Mistral, Groq, X.ai)
- Smart content summarization
- Visual content analysis
- Intelligent translation assistant

- 多模型AI对话支持（OpenRouter、OpenAI、Claude、Mistral、Groq、X.ai）
- 智能内容总结
- 视觉内容分析
- 智能翻译助手

 📝 Advanced Content Management | 高级内容管理
- One-click content capture
- Smart highlighting and organization
- Automated knowledge categorization
- Personal digital library building

- 一键内容捕获
- 智能高亮和组织
- 自动知识分类
- 个人数字图书馆构建

🔄 Seamless Integration | 无缝集成
- Collapsible toolbar
- Side panel interface
- Context menu integration
- Cross-platform language support (English/Chinese)

- 可折叠工具栏
- 侧边栏界面
- 右键菜单集成
- 跨平台语言支持（中文/英文）

🛡️ Privacy & Security | 隐私与安全
- Local content processing
- Customizable AI services
- Proxy support
- Serverless architecture

- 本地内容处理
- 可定制AI服务
- 代理支持
- 无服务器架构

 🚀 Get Started | 开始使用

1. Install Frago
2. Click the extension icon
3. Start exploring the web with AI superpowers!

1. 安装 Frago
2. 点击扩展图标
3. 开启AI加持的网络探索之旅！

💪 Power Features | 强大功能

- Progressive Loading - Watch as content loads with visual feedback
- Special Site Support - Enhanced features for YouTube, Twitter, ChatGPT, and more
- Developer-Friendly - Modular code structure, easy to extend
- Real-time Updates - Stay current with the latest content

- 渐进式加载 - 可视化反馈的内容加载
- 特殊站点支持 - 针对YouTube、Twitter、ChatGPT等的增强功能
- 开发者友好 - 模块化代码结构，易于扩展
- 实时更新 - 保持最新内容状态

---

Transform your browsing experience today with Frago - Where AI meets web browsing intelligence.

立即使用 Frago 提升您的浏览体验 - AI与网络浏览智能的完美结合。

*Your personal AI web assistant, empowering smarter browsing, learning, and content management.*

*您的私人AI网络助手，助力更智能的浏览、学习和内容管理。*
